title: On the Backdrop of Our Nights God with His Knowing Finger Traces a Multiform Implacable Nightmare (Sur le fond de nos nuits Dieu de son doigt savant dessine un cauchemar multiforme et sans trêve) from The Flowers of Evil (Les Fleurs du mal)
medium: One from a portfolio of nine photogravures (including cover)
credits: Gift of The Ian Woodner Family Collection
